text:
I suppose this may have been answered here already, but I can't really think of how to search for it.

Is there a way to create default / placeholder content for a Programmable email module that depends on a contact property value to run a crm_objects() function to populate the content? Whenever I place these into my emails, it renders as just a blank box. Which makes sense, since there's no content to display yet. But it makes it hard to see if the module has been placed correctly / at all, and hard to move it around.

Does anyone know of a solution to this?
Hey <@U05BC4T17T4> are you trying to test it? It is quite annoying testing programmable emails pulling different objects. Did you see this new beta? It might help if that is what you are stuck with
What I do is publish the email and just send test emails only to myself. Not with the "Send test email" option but rather through a workflow, actual marketing email :slightly_smiling_face:
